text: 7|64|Tathapi'o sihamte te'omka michaliya buli kaâ€™le. Phalata te'omka arau te'omra saite yisakale naramta araohana karaichila ami te'omlokaka ud'dhara karaicho arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka micha pratipanna karaichila sihamtaka ami duba'i maraicho. Niscaya sihamta achila eta andha sampradaya.
